snippet: The playwright-director duo of Wallace Shawn and André Gregory on their 40-year collaboration and the pleasures and benefits of rehearsing a play for a really long time.
abstract: Public Theater and Theater for a New Audience are sponsoring a series to celebrate 40-year collaboration between playwright Wallace Shawn and director Andre Gregory; series will stage their little-seen play The Designated Mourner and debut their latest piece Grasses of a Thousand Colors.
lead_paragraph: The playwright-director duo of Wallace Shawn and André Gregory on their 40-year collaboration and the pleasures and benefits of rehearsing a play for a really long time.
